entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1100 metres rising to 1400 metres near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
